page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: There are only a few houses in this sparsely populated area. There are a number of older farmhouses. An interesting farmhouse is Lovington Farm to the north of the block,a large red-brick structure.Typical building materials are brick with flints.(the underlying rock is chalk). Hampage farmhouse is unoccupied.Other than the farmers and their workers,most of the population of the area is mixed. Some of the older cottages are owned by retired couples or people who work in Winchester or beyond. The cost of a 17th century house varies. At the moment we cannot find one which is 'on the market'. We estimate the current price of such a period house to be anything above Â£80,000.
